mapper.select: select sk.*,sm.Status as status from PAC_StockItem sm,PAC_Stock sk where sm.WarehouseNo=sk.warehouseno and sk.id=#{id}

select count(*) from ( select rownum rn,sk.*,sm.Status as status from PAC_StockItem sm,PAC_Stock sk
and sm.WarehouseNo=sk.warehouseno
and sk.warehouseno like concat(concat('%',#{warehouseno}),'%')
and sk.reservoirtype=#{reservoirtype}
and sk.transport like concat(concat('%',#{transport}),'%')
and sk.subordinateunit like concat(concat('%',#{subordinateunit}),'%')
)
mapper.sql: ID, WAREHOUSENO, RESERVOIRTYPE, TRANSPORT, SUBORDINATEUNIT, DRAWERNO, DRAWERNAME, DRAWERTIME, REMARK
mapper.insert:
insert into BOS.PAC_STOCK
ID,
WAREHOUSENO,
RESERVOIRTYPE,
TRANSPORT,
SUBORDINATEUNIT,
DRAWERNO,
DRAWERNAME,
DRAWERTIME,
REMARK,
#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{warehouseno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{reservoirtype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{transport,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{subordinateunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{drawerno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{drawername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{drawertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update BOS.PAC_STOCK
WAREHOUSENO = #{warehouseno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVOIRTYPE = #{reservoirtype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TRANSPORT = #{transport,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUBORDINATEUNIT = #{subordinateunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DRAWERNO = #{drawerno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DRAWERNAME = #{drawername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DRAWERTIME = #{drawertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update BOS.PAC_STOCK set WAREHOUSENO = #{warehouseno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVOIRTYPE = #{reservoirtype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TRANSPORT = #{transport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBORDINATEUNIT = #{subordinateunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRAWERNO = #{drawerno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DRAWERNAME = #{drawername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRAWERTIME = #{drawertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
